product_meta.title: OGX Renewing + Argan Oil of Morocco Conditioner, 13 Ounce
product_meta.description: After a hair treatment or deep cleanse, give your hair strength, softness, and shine with the OGX Renewing Argan Oil of Morocco Conditioner. This restorative conditioner is infused with Moroccan argan oil that helps nourish hair with a thick, creamy formula that also helps detangle. This conditioner helps repair damaged strands, restore strength and penetrates the hair shaft for bouncy, silky soft perfection with ultra moisture. Argan oil from Morocco is an essential oil that helps lubricate hair and fights. With a lightweight and sulfate-free formula, this refreshing conditioner is a great haircare product for fine hair, straight hair, curly hair, thick hair, coarse hair and damaged hair.
